item.title: Moving to Hugo
item.description:
This is my next try to start a blog. Previous one was nearly two years ago. It is interesting to see how fast technology is evolving. Hugo - the tool I am planning to use now - wasn’t even in a stable state.

Hugo is a simple static site generator - it doesn’t have any dependencies to run. The older site generators had tons of dependencies - language, runtime, a couple of libraries, plugins etc. They often had caveats with some platforms(windows, usually) and occasional version conflicts. It wasn’t that bad for a person with software development experience, but if you compare it to a single executable file that is Hugo - difference is dramatic.

As a result, it took me about 20 minutes to set up Hugo site and it took me a several hours with an older technology. So if you want to use a static site generator - you should give Hugo a try.
